column1: General  has  not issued  any direct instructions to the  Magistrate with regard  to

the  conduct  and/or  conclusion  and/or 
termination  of 
the  non-summary
proceedings  and  therefore  the  said  letter cannot  be  construed  as  a directive

the  Code  of  Criminal 
issued  under 
the  provisions  of  Section  398(2)  of
Procedure Act No  15 of 1979, as amended.
